segments.text: Doris , I'm glad you're home . I'm terrified . I don't know what to do !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think someone is stalking me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it can't be . Really ? Who ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I saw him the first time Tuesday . He was at the cafe . I noticed he was looking at me a lot . Not just the usual looking , but staring.He just kept staring at me . He didn't stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't do anything . Finally , he left.But then I saw him again today . Outside the shoe store . Near the cafe . I went into a CD store and pretended I was looking at CD's . But then he came in too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did he leave when you left ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me . He was following me .
segments.speaker: S1
